title: Risk vs. Reward: How Kristen Faulkner Used Her VC Skills to Win America’s First Road Gold Medal in 40 Years
content:
Ex-venture capitalist meticulously game-planned every scenario before Sunday's chaotic race, making the right call at every crucial moment: 'Everything in my life has prepared me for this.'

Read the full article at Risk vs. Reward: How Kristen Faulkner Used Her VC Skills to Win America’s First Road Gold Medal in 40 Years on Velo.
author: ahood
